summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1383, for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from the south margin of Massachusetts Street to the northeast corner of Block 371, Seattle Tide Lands, also a branch connecting with said roadway and leading to the north margin of Lot sixteen (16), Block 370, Seattle Tide Lands, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway therein, twenty (20) feet in width, under Ordinance No. 15113 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
